segments.text: I glance at the kitchen and see the everyday routine unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is drying dishes, apron tied neatly around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, the water from the sink is spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a slippery puddle that could cause a bad fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in it, oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the childrenâ€” the boy is on that shaky stool!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down with those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is reaching up, not helping stabilize him at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if the stool tips and he gets hurt?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing water might make the floor even more hazardous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm garden view contrasts with this tense situation inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look so innocent, but the risks are real.
segments.speaker: PAR
